title: Assad Arrives in Russia After Fleeing Syria, Russian Media Says
content: President Bashar al-Assad landed in Russia, according to state media outlets there and two Iranian officials, after fleeing the country as rebels took control of Syria’s capital.
summary: President Bashar al-Assad landed in Russia, according to state media outlets there and two Iranian officials, after fleeing the country as rebels took control of Syria’s capital.

title: Bashar al-Assad of Syria Falls to Rebels
content: President Bashar al-Assad had kept opposition forces at bay for a decade with help from Russia and Iran. But rebels struck at a moment of weakness for those countries.
summary: President Bashar al-Assad had kept opposition forces at bay for a decade with help from Russia and Iran. But rebels struck at a moment of weakness for those countries.

title: With Assad’s Fall, Iran’s ‘Axis of Resistance’ Unravels
